description:
When fresh powder awaits, there's no time to mess with details. Low-profile and purely functional, the Verte 18 lets you drop in without delay. Multiple carry systems let you secure your skis or board regardless of approach method. A dedicated avalanche compartment makes sure your shovel, probe, and saw are always handy.

  • Lightweight, blended recycled nylon ripstop fabric with PFC-free DWR coating
  • CloudControl hipbelt stretches to allow for unrestricted movement
  • Snow shedding molded backpanel clears snow build up between you and the pack
  • A full-length zipper gives easy access to the bottom of your pack
  • Side zippered pocket provides secure storage and is designed for easy access while riding a chairlift
  • Glove-friendly zipper pulls and buckles
  • Top zippered stash pocket for easy access to smaller items
  • Top and bottom compression with cam-locking buckles on top for secure ski/snowboard attachment
  • Ski and snowboard carry system provides diagonal carry, a-frame and vertical snowboard options
  • Dedicated front pocket for avalanche rescue gear
  • Internal hydration sleeve with SpeedClip hanger compatible with Gregory's Hydro reservoirs (reservoir not included)
  • Insulated hydration harness sleeve with closed cell foam can help to keep hose from freezing
name: Gregory Verte 18 Backpack - Unisex
